name: wait
description: Wait for asynchronous operations to complete with intelligent timeout handling and progress monitoring

hints.primary: Advanced operation coordination tool with timeout management and error remediation
hints.usage: wait (default 240s timeout), wait --timeout_seconds 120 (custom timeout), wait --tools cargo,npm (filter by tool)
hints.wait_hint: **WARNING:** This is a blocking tool and makes you inefficient. **ONLY** use this if you have NO other tasks and cannot proceed until completion. It is **ALWAYS** better to perform other work and let results be pushed to you.
hints.timeout: Progressive warnings at 50%, 75%, and 90% completion with automatic error remediation suggestions
hints.remediation: Automatically detects common timeout causes: stale lock files, network issues, resource conflicts, and provides specific resolution steps

timeout_seconds.description: Maximum time to wait in seconds (default: 240, min: 10, max: 1800)

tools.description: Comma-separated tool name prefixes to wait for (optional; waits for all if omitted)

subcommand.name: run
subcommand.description: Wait for previously started asynchronous operations to complete with configurable timeout (10-1800 seconds, default 240s). Includes progressive timeout warnings at 50%, 75%, and 90% completion, plus automatic detection and remediation suggestions for common timeout causes including stale lock files, network issues, and resource conflicts.

options.name: timeout_seconds
options.description: Maximum time to wait in seconds (default: 240, min: 10, max: 1800)

options.name: tools
options.description: Comma-separated tool name prefixes to wait for (optional; waits for all if omitted)
